name: Ripplica
tagline: Automate any web task with just a simple video.
description: Record a workflow once. Ripplicaâ€™s AI agents repeat it for you across your browser apps - no code, no APIs, no prompting required.

name: TinyCommand
tagline: Stop duct-taping tools. Run everything with one command.
description: TinyCommand brings your forms, workflows, data, emails, and AI agents together, so everything connects and runs on its own. Build smarter, automate faster, and manage it all in one no-code platform.

name: plok.sh
tagline: Github to blog. Instantly. Free forever.
description: Turn any GitHub repo into a fast, beautiful blog. No CMS. No dashboard. No accounts. No builds. Just your repo. If your repo has a `/blog` folder with markdown files, plok.sh renders them as clean, themed blog posts: It supports: * 20+ themes * Shiki code highlighting * optional `blog.config.yaml` * optional headers and footers for templating. * optional `/blog/links.yaml` (Linktree-style page) * automatic TOC * Google Analytics if you add your own G-ID * zero server-side storage

name: Unfold
tagline: Generate interactive courses on any topic. Ft. Gemini 3
description: (try it out: its free) unfold creates animated courses on any topic and you can interact with it. it asks you questions to understand you, what you want to learn and how you learn best.

name: Seefy
tagline: AI event intelligence for real-world revenue pipeline
description: Seefy is your AI event GTM super agent, driving real-world revenue pipeline by tracking the global business and professional event universe. It automates tailored event discovery and evaluation, plus pre-event targeted account and lead capture, so teams can focus on the events that drive real revenue.

name: Formly 2.0
tagline: Create lead gen quizzes with instant visual results
description: The all-in-one quiz builder for marketers. Advanced scoring, real-time charts, and dynamic PDF reports. Formly helps you craft quizzes that engage, convert, and delight.

name: Bookingbird.io
tagline: The adaptable booking OS for services, resources & events.
description: A booking is never just a booking. Itâ€™s a first impression, a new client, a packed event. ðŸš€ Bookingbird honors this by adapting to YOU, not the other way around. name: RightNow CUDA Editor
tagline: AI code editor for GPU development
description: RightNow AI is the only AI code editor built specifically for CUDA. Features agentic AI that knows your GPU architecture, real Nsight Compute profiling inline, natural language to NCU commands, and 86+ GPU emulation with <2% error. Benchmark across block sizes, thread counts, and memory layouts. View PTX/SASS assembly side-by-side. Profile multiple GPUs simultaneously. Connect to remote GPUs or run fully local with offline LLM support. Supports all NVIDIA GPUs from GTX 1060 to H100.

name: Tag my Tab
tagline: Organize your browser tabs with tags and comments
description: Browser extension to organize, manage, and save tabs with tags, comments, and search. Tag It: Categorize any tab in one click with custom tags Comment It: Add notes so you never wonder "why did I save this?" again Find It: Search by title, URL, tag, or commentâ€”find anything instantly Close It: Confidently shut tabs knowing they're saved forever Sync It: Access your organized tabs across all your devices

name: Waylight
tagline: ChatGPT, but with context from your tabs, meetings, and docs
description: Waylight is an AI assistant that understands everything you do on your computer â€” your meetings, documents, tabs, and messages. It builds a private, on-device memory of your activity so you can ask questions about anything youâ€™ve seen and get instant, accurate answers.

name: Gorillaa AI
tagline: Complete omni-channel marketing with just prompts
description: Run your email marketing in minutes, not hours. With Gorillaa AI, you simply prompt your goals and watch email designs, automations, and reports build themselves. No complex tools, no manual work. Just smarter email marketing with one prompt.

name: Formbot
tagline: Allow your users to chat with your online forms using AI
description: Formbot allows you to create forms with natural language and collect responses via a traditional form or use AI-native conversational chat. Our goal is to make creating and using forms simple, and super fun experience for everyone.

name: Cleanlist AI
tagline: Find, enrich, clean, and verify prospecting leads instantly.
description: Cleanlist turns messy lead lists into verified, sales-ready data. Upload a CSV, LinkedIn URL, or single contact and get instant enrichment with 85% phone match accuracy and 95%+ verified emails. Smart Columns go further, uncovering company insights, ICP fit, and website intelligence in seconds. Connect directly to your CRM or outreach tools and start every campaign with clean, complete data.

name: Lynksurf
tagline: The Ultimate Linkedin Tool
description: LynkSurf makes LinkedIn productivity effortless. While others give scattered AI tools, LynkSurf brings an all-in-one suite: instant profile summaries, smart first-message drafting, AI-powered comments, engagement boosters, and deep profile insights. No switching tabs, no manual writingâ€”just faster networking, smarter outreach, and higher conversions.

name: IndieAppCircle
tagline: Get feedback on your app from other indie devs for free.
description: Upload your app to IndieAppCircle (a simple link is enough) and get new users and their feedback. Earn credits by testing other apps.
